labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The group DM is not listed in the quick switcher (while it IS shown, however, if you invoke the QS from a (group) DM or a server)
data.expected_result: The group DM is listed in the quick switcher
data.short_description: Group DMs aren't listed in the Quick Switcher when invoking it from the friends list page
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're part of a group DM - Go to your friends list - Invoke Quick Switcher via either Ctrl + K or Ctrl + T (or Cmd + K/Cmd + T if you're on macOS) - Search for a group DM you're in
